name: BioBot Escape
description:
BioBot (you) are engineered to explore the universe… Over 9000 years have passed since you left earth and finally you found a planet harbouring life! However the planet’s sun is unstable and will run out of energy soon… On your descend to the planet's surface you have taken damage! You need to collect scrap in order to upgrade and repair your robot parts and escape the planet. In order to survive the planet's many dangers you will have to learn from its rare lifeforms. Extract their DNA in order to evolve new bio abilities!

Controls:
Use WASD or Arrow keys to Walk

Spacebar to interact with the world (pickup) 

Press T to open/close Tech upgrade menu

Use mouse to click on updates
